text: When the student is ready, the teacher will appear.
Silence is sometimes the best answer.
Our sorrows and wounds are healed only when we touch them with compassion.
The root of suffering is attachment.
The mind is everything. What you think you become.
A jug fills drop by drop.
Holding on to anger is like grasping a hot coal with the intent of throwing it at someone else; you are the one who gets burned.
The way is not in the sky. The way is in the heart.
Three things cannot be long hidden: the sun, the moon, and the truth.
Health is the greatest gift, contentment the greatest wealth, faithfulness the best relationship.
You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
Be like the lotus flower that grows in the mud but remains clean and fragrant.
Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
A noble person is mindful and thankful of the favors received from others.
